sentence.text: Pre-citrate transport core needle biopsies and postoperative tumor samples were immunohistochemically stained for nuclear factor erythroid 2-related factor 2 (positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II), Kelch-like ECH-associated protein 1 (proteasomal ubiquitin-independent protein catabolic process), thioredoxin (Trx), and peroxiredoxin I (Prx I).

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Higher pre-citrate transport nuclear Prx I expression predicted smaller size of a resected tumor (p = 0.00052; r = -0.550), and higher pre-NACT cytoplasmic Prx I expression predicted a lower amount of evacuated nodal metastasis (p = 0.0024; r = -0.472).
